ygData.subject: bandages
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah...neat, something I ve never tried in all my young Wizard s life.  How does the bind wound skill work?  I think I tried it once some levels back but it
ygData.messageBody:
Ah...neat, something I've never tried in all my young Wizard's life. How
does the bind wound skill work? I think I tried it once some levels back
but it didn't work so I gave up. ;) A assume I should pump in a couple
points into the skill to get it started? About how much healing does it
accomplish per try? Time for me to buy a handful of bandages and try again
I guess...

Hey, another question I have for everybody out of curiosity: now that
specialization has kicked in...what does everybody have in mind for that? I
would think it the most popular approach to specialize in nuking
abilities...but would any of you have the need to specialize in something
else and why? ;)

-- Lim'Dul

>I also try to carry lots of badages o
me so I can heal them up a bit. I find the bind wound skill very handy >and
it
has saved me and others countless times. It also saves your healers a >lot
of
mana if everyone is at 50% health before the healer finsihes the job. >Well
these are my thoughts, i may bot be the most pwerful wizard in Norrath, >but
I am
wel thought of and I can live withthat.

>Dupont Human Wizard of Freeport
Espiriit de Corps Order of the Head
>Cazic Thule
